Ã¢â€Å  DESCRIPTION:
1715, Caribbean. Pirates have become true masters of the sea and land, by organizing their own republic wickedness, greed and cruelty.

Among these robbers noticeable young Captain Edward Kenuey. His journey has allowed him to win the respect of such legends as Blackbeard, but also drew in the ancient war between the Assassins and the Templars, in a war that could destroy all that we have created the pirates.

Welcome to the Golden Age of Piracy!
Ã¢â€Å  FEATURES:
The brave REBEL Assassins 
Become Edward Kenueyem, charismatic and cruel captain of the pirates, who have been trained assassins. Edward skillfully uses the hidden blade of the Order of the Assassins, and new weapons, including cutlasses and a double set of four guns.

EXPLORE THE OPEN WORLD FULL OF OPPORTUNITIES RAZOOBRAZNYH 
Explore the widest and most diverse worlds ever created Assassin's Creed. Explore over 75 unique locations from Kingston to Nassau and live a life of real pirates:
Plunder the shipwrecked vessel 
Kill the Knights Templar in the boom town 
Hunt for rare animals in the wild jungle 
Look for the lost treasure in the ruins 
Hide from enemies in secret coves
BECOME THE MOST DANGEROUS Pirates of the Kariba 
Drive your ship "the Jackdaw" and instills fear in all who meet you on your way. Looting and counting the loot, improve your ship, buy more ammo and supplies that you will need it for future sea battles. Improvements to the ship are extremely important for marine Edward success throughout the game. Attack and take on board the ship massive galleons, type the command loyal sailors and go towards adventure.

LEARN ALL ABOUT THIS PIRATE LIFE 
Face of such legendary characters as Blackbeard, Calico Jack, Benjamin Hornigold and set republic of lawlessness in the Bahamas, which will ultimately be the beginning of golden era of piracy.

BEST multi-player mode in the history of ASSASSIN'S CREED 
Test your skills of the killer, traveling to the Caribbean islands, discovering new pirates and exploring exotic and colorful locations. You will also be available for Game Lab, where you will be able to create multiplayer modes, choosing abilities, rules and rewards. Play and share your modes with friends.
